alert.note: Alert for Boone; Marion (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 7:43PM CDT until July 17 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Marion County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Boone County in north central Arkansas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 743 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hollister, or near Branson, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Diamond City... Bergman... Lead Hill... Omaha... Willis... Myrtle... Self... Crumpler Subdivision... South Lead Hill... New Hope in Boone County... Hopewell in Boone County... Bull Shoals Lake... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
